q1: I have confidence in this team
a1: Who do you think the most over-rated national side is?
q2: At the moment I would say Italy
a2: I think Spain is very overrated.

a4: Spain is overrated and I think that Spanish food is better than British and have more variety

a5: Spain is the best team in the world.
